Bah FF1 still 0wns! ;o)

X
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE =

  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 7:39 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Starcraft and Neo Beast Wars/Machines


  Yeah, 3 of my character na=
mes are from Final Fantasy 3. Rizopas and Atma, and the name Etchingar is a=
 tweak on the name Intangir, another Final Fantasy 3 character. Love that g=
ame!...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Jonathan Hogan 
    To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 3:01 PM
    Subject:=
 Re: Starcraft and Neo Beast Wars/Machines


    lol true alot of people us=
e names from their other favourite games. Like mine, Xiane, it's my account=
 name and the name of one of my classes in Diablo2 :)

    X
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: dcoburn 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
    Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 3:54 AM
      Subject: Starcraft and Neo =
Beast Wars/Machines


      Listen everyone, I have been noting that charac=
ter names are coming from the totally wicked PC/N64 game, Starcraft.  Here =
are the names that I found:

      Neo Beast Wars RPG:
                  -Z=
ergling (Of the Zerg race, fast, cheap and effective in groups)

      Neo =
Beast Machines RPG:
                  -Raszagal (Leader of the Protoss Dark=
 Templar who were banished from the Protoss homeworld, Aiur)
              =
    -Archon (Of the Protoss race, two High Templars may merge into a psioni=
c entity known as an Archon.  Archons are really strong, and their movement=
 isn't so bad)

      These 3 characters are all named after units in Starc=
raft(Raszagal is not a playable unit).  I guess Starcraft is more popular t=
han I thought.  Anyway, I'm not saying that these names are cheap, I'm just=
 pointing out that they are from Starcraft/Starcraft: Brood War/Starcraft 6=
4.  

      NOTE: The descriptions I put for these 3 guys are just from Sta=
rcraft, you don't have to use them for NBWRPG or NBMRPG.

-----------------=
